page.title: 17A modern house in Newborough
page.content:
{ A typical modern dwelling}in the village, with 3 in the family, will be a traditionally designed, detached 8 roomed house in 1/3 acre with 4 bedrooms and tandem garage. { Lounge}with open fireplace constructed of handmade bricks and Westmorland slate. A traditional design 3 piece suite, well-stocked book case, prints and porcelain. { Fitted kitchen}with electric oven and hob, washing machine, refrigerator and deep freeze. { Fitted bathroom}and cloakroom. { Central}heating - solid fuel or oil. { Fitted}carpets, vinyl floor tiles. { Central}lighting plus spot lights in kitchen.
{ Garden}- lawns, flower beds, shrub borders, varied trees, vegetable patch with river running through the garden.
